front.title: •Biker Scout Gear
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Biker scouts have armor = 3 and are immune to Scramble. Also, Scout Blaster, Comlink, DH-17 blaster and Blaster Rack deploy for free and are destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Standard-issue equipment for Imperial biker scouts. Adds electromagnetic vision enhancement visor and boosted comlink. Protects with lightweight head and upper body armor.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
